Class SimpleLineSearchCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.line.SimpleLineSearchCursor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineSearchCursor

    public class SimpleLineSearchCursor
extends Object
implements LineSearchCursor
    A basic line search cursor representing a linear parametric path.
